name: Cyberpandino Cluster

scripts.install:all: node scripts/pm.js install && node scripts/pm.js install --cwd client && node scripts/pm.js install --cwd server && echo "âœ… Installazione completata con successo!"
scripts.start: concurrently "node scripts/pm.js run server" "node scripts/pm.js run client" "node scripts/pm.js run electron"

author: Cyberpandino (Matteo Errera, Roberto Zaccardi, Ludovico Verde)
